medical_history.chief_complaint: Evaluation of two slowly enlarging finger ulcers within palmoplantar keratoderma.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The finger ulcers have been present for 2 years and are slowly enlarging. The patient has had palmoplantar keratoderma since birth and also noted hyperhidrosis of the palms and soles.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of laryngeal carcinoma surgically treated 5 years earlier.
medical_history.family_history: Family history notable for several relatives with palmoplantar keratoderma, including 4 brothers with similar conditions.
medical_history.social_history: The patient is a 46-year-old fisherman and is married with no offspring.
